# Welcome

This slide deck is auto-generated from `slides.yaml`.

Run `slidedeck build` to regenerate after adding figures.

---

# Getting Started

Add your first figure:

```bash
slidedeck add figures/data_exploration/my_plot.png \
  --topic data_exploration \
  --title "My First Plot"
```

Then rebuild:

```bash
slidedeck build
```
